name: Mission Critical Cloud Manifesto
tagline: Cosmic Cloud delivers high quality Cloud Orchestration software to run Mission Critical workloads.
body:
We learned we can only succeed in running Mission Critical workloads when we master the complete chain. Cosmic is the missing link in orchestrating The Mission Critical Cloud.

### Mission Critical Cloud is built on:

**C**raftmanship

**O**peness

**S**table operations

**M**easureable goals

**I**nnovation

**C**an do attitude


-- The Mission Critical Cloud Team of Schuberg Philis
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
